column4: Could someone please help me? I just want to install the GUI so I can work on this server
What sort of GUI do you want?
Did you want the full desktop?
alright, are you connected to the internet on this box?
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install ubuntu-destop
No, you need to update first
its just sudo apt-get update, and what it does is downloads the package lists from the interblags.  Before that, the only packages you knew about were those on the server CD (if that)
did you `sudo apt-get update`?
Do you have any package managers(aptitude, another apt-get, whatever) running?
Don't.  What makes you think its running?
because you asked
Do you have a prompt? or something else?
sudo apt-get install update   works, but  sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop is what gives me the error
just the prompt, only thing it gives me
alright, uh, try it again.  sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop, same error?  and what are those error(s)?
apparently it just didn't like me having the && thing between the commands. when I did each seporately it works
thanks, seems to be working. It's downloading and starting now
Check out "replace" instead.
Oh, you need to do it for the contents?
replace isnt a command its a program.  I... couldve sworn it was installed by default, but I suppose might not be anymore.
The description around it didn't make sense re: contents.  Well, shucks.  That's quite a task.  At any rate.
Lets take this to #ubuntu-offtopic, itll be less noisy for everyone involved
